tutorials.title: Building and Exporting
tutorials.description: Configure build settings and export your visual novel for different platforms.
tutorials.author: NovelMind Team

steps.title: Build Settings
steps.content: The Build Settings panel configures how your project is exported. Set target platforms and optimization options here.

steps.title: Target Platforms
steps.content: Select which platforms to build for: Windows, macOS, Linux, or Web. Each has specific settings.

steps.title: Quality Settings
steps.content: Adjust texture quality, audio compression, and other settings to balance file size and quality.

steps.title: Included Languages
steps.content: Choose which languages to include in the build. You can create separate builds for different regions.

steps.title: Start Build
steps.content: Click Build to start the export process. Progress is shown in the Console panel.

steps.title: Build Diagnostics
steps.content: If there are warnings or errors, they appear in the Diagnostics panel. Resolve them before shipping.

hints.content: Resolve these warnings before building for release.
